findthagame.title: FindThaGame
findthagame.description: A tool designed to track down games using specific criteria you remember. It runs multiple simultaneous queries via Apicalypse and uses a custom scoring algorithm to rank results from the IGDB database.

ocr-to-txt.title: OCR to TXT
ocr-to-txt.description: An app that extracts text from images and screenshots using Tesseract OCR. It allows for pre-processing adjustments like contrast and brightness to ensure high accuracy even on low-quality images.

lease-sentinel.title: Lease Sentinel
lease-sentinel.description: An automated deadline monitoring system that uses Gemini 1.5 Flash to turn legal clauses into actionable alerts. It integrates with Slack, Telegram, email, and custom webhooks for notifications.

palindot.title: Palindot
palindot.description: A URL shortener that generates unique 'palindromic' codes that read the same forwards and backwards, creating symmetric short addresses for links.

shell-c.title: Shell C
shell-c.description: A custom command-line interface built from scratch with expanded capabilities. It includes tools for file inspection, weather updates, network diagnostics, and more. Cross-platform support (Windows, Mac, Linux).

retro-notes.title: Retro Notes
retro-notes.description: A note-taking app with a nostalgic 8-bit aesthetic. Designed for quick thought categorization and archival with seamless auto-saving functionality.

exhale-app.title: Exhale App
exhale-app.description: A mindfulness tool for clearing your mind. Record your thoughts to express feelings and let them go; recordings are played back once and then automatically discarded to encourage the act of letting go.

useless-polymath.title: Useless Polymath
useless-polymath.description: A collection of interactive exercises for mastering niche skills and systems, from reading electronic color codes to predicting lunar phases or deciphering secret codes.

civy.title: Civy
civy.description: A SaaS for crafting multi-versioned resumes and cover letters with live previews and automated formatting. Supports multiple templates and YAML-based structure definitions.

react-three-text-fx.title: React Three Text FX
react-three-text-fx.description: A React component library for advanced text effects, built with GSAP and Three.js for seamless integration into React Three Fiber environments.

openrise-www.title: Openrise Landing Page
openrise-www.description: The official website for Openrise, an open-source community dedicated to building free, accessible tools for creators and developers.

te-filter.title: TE Filter
te-filter.description: A Chrome extension that streamlines Moodle navigation. It replaces long lists with an instant search menu and automates download format selection and file labeling.

items.description: Leading a developer team to create open-source products for the community.
Building end-to-end solutions and scalable web apps. Specialized in automation tools to solve operational bottlenecks.
Developed multiple web projects, coordinated service desk operations, and collaborated on strategic planning to optimize internal workflows.
Engineered automation scripts in Python and PowerShell for deployments and tasks, and built Chrome extensions to streamline operations.
Maintained web and VoIP platforms while standardizing digital evaluation tools to refine admission and placement processes.
Led digital transformation initiatives, using advanced analytics to identify bottlenecks and developing web tools that boosted efficiency by 500%.
Automated administrative systems and processes through the development and deployment of PowerShell and Python scripts.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Goal-driven and always evolving.
paragraphs: I wrote my first lines of code at 12. Since then, I've built a wide range of projects across diverse technologies. I solve complex problems and strive to innovate wherever it makes sense.
Here you can see the tools I use. Click on them to filter my projects by technology.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.tagline: Want to see all my certifications? Check my Credly and LinkedIn profiles.

footer.headline: Have a project in mind or looking for a developer? Let's build something great together.
